channel.title: Kike Bodí – LLM Engineering and AI Systems
channel.description: LLM Engineering, private RAG systems, AI agents, and CI optimization by Enrique (Kike) Bodí.

item.title: RAG Series | Part 3: RAG Implementation
item.description: Implement your private RAG with LangChain, Chroma, and local LLMs. Configure embeddings, connect the retriever, and prepare for downstream chat and evaluation.

item.title: RAG Series | Part 2: Create the vector retriever
item.description: Build the vector retriever for your private RAG with LangChain, Chroma, and local LLMs. Configure embeddings, connect the retriever, and prepare for downstream chat and evaluation.

item.title: Populate Vector Database - Building a Private RAG System with LangChain, Chroma, and Local LLMs
item.description: End-to-end tutorial on building a private Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) system using LangChain, Chroma, and local/open-source LLMs, focused on enterprise-ready knowledge retrieval.

item.title: LLM Engineering | Token optimization
item.description: Practical patterns to reduce cost and latency in LLM applications: token optimization, caching strategies with LiteLLM, and thin system prompts for production systems.

item.title: LLM Engineering | Running local LLMs and APIs
item.description: Hands-on notes for running local LLMs with Ollama and integrating OpenAI, Anthropic, OpenRouter, LangChain, and LiteLLM into multi-model AI workflows and agents.

item.title: CI Automation for Engineering Teams
item.description: How to optimize CI pipelines with selective testing, Gradle plugins, and AI automation to cut build times and improve developer productivity.

item.title: Biohacking para preparar el examen de acceso a Mensa
item.description: Estrategias de biohacking, nutrición y hábitos para maximizar el rendimiento cognitivo antes de una prueba de razonamiento tipo Mensa.

item.title: Two-way Data Binding on Android with Kotlin
item.description: Tutorial on implementing two-way data binding in Android using Kotlin, Architecture Components, and clean MVVM patterns.

item.title: Viaje a Tromsø para ver la aurora boreal
item.description: Relato práctico de un viaje a Tromsø para ver la aurora boreal, con recomendaciones sobre vuelos, alojamiento y planificación.
